item.title: ABOUT
item.description:
We are I AM COMPUTER_ — technical operators with over three decades of real-world experience across systems architecture, network engineering, IT support, design, and advanced hardware integration.

We solve complex problems with speed, clarity, and precision — from building secure infrastructure to recovering critical systems and delivering custom-built solutions that others won’t touch.

We value uptime, clean execution, and trust. When failure is not an option, we’re your failsafe.


operator.level: senior
protocols: systems | networks | design | hardware
status: always online

We fix what breaks. We build what doesn’t exist yet. No noise. Just efficient, tailored results.

item.title: TERMS
item.description:
Billing & Payment Terms All services are billed in Canadian Dollars (CAD). Invoices are payable via Interac e-Transfer or debit/credit card. Alternate payment methods available upon request.

Unless otherwise agreed in writing, all work is treated as confidential and may not be disclosed, published, or redistributed.

Intellectual Property & Usage Rights All deliverables remain the exclusive property of CMPTR INTL INC. until full payment is received. Upon settlement, clients are granted the agreed usage rights — including source files and production assets, unless stated otherwise.
